edu.usc.projecttalent.cognitive

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.CountDownTimer
      • edu.usc.projecttalent.cognitive.Timer

  • public class Timer
extends android.os.CountDownTimer
    Timer set for each question. Warning show up on one minute. Quit on two minutes.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Anindya Dutta

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ACTIVENEXT
      Intent when the next button is activated and responsive to user clicks.
      static java.lang.String NOANSWER
      Intent when no answer has been selected by a user and next has been clicked.
